mainHeadline: Help us fulfill the dream of building a roof for our club and being able to change the reality of our neighborhood
mainCardTitle: The club is a space for sports and recreation, but more importantly for kids to feel they belong.
mainCardDescription: We need a space for our kids and teenagers to be able to play, train, grow and develop in an adequate environment.
videoDescription: The more than 300 kids and teenagers that belong to the club need a shelter to keep growing and developing as athletes, but more importantly, as good people.
